amendment.description: To provide for the distribution of funds under the infrastructure performance and maintenance program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2388 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 17 - 78. Record Vote Number: 11.

action.text: Amendment SA 2388 proposed by Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1199-1205, S1206; text: CR S1199) To provide for the distribution of funds under the infrastructure performance and maintenance program.
